trigger_description: This trigger fires when the air purifier changes mode.
This trigger fires when the air purifier is turned off.
This trigger fires when the air purifier turns on.
This trigger fires when the remaining filter-life drops below a set percentage.
This trigger fires when the air purifier detects a certain air quality (Very Good, Good, Moderate, or Bad).
This trigger fires when the air purifier changes fan speed.
This trigger fires when the display turns on or off.
